svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - January 18 2021

title: "Week in Ethereum News
Jan 18, 2021" date: "2021-01-18"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
• All the cool protocol changes happening in 2021
• Latest 1559 implementer call . Beiko’s notes
• Transaction pool sorting with 1559
• Block variance in 1559 is fine
• Barnabé’s notebook simulating the transition to 1559
• Basefee manipulation simulations in 1559
• A list of 1559 resources
• Piper: how to get functional light clients , part 2 , part 3
• Alexandra state network update : successful 20 node testnet serving 1m block headers
Eth2
• Latest what’s new in eth2 . The chain “could hardly be running better.” Upgrade in ~6 months to
fine-tune and reset slashing penalties.
• Latest eth2 implementer call . Ben Edgington’s notes . Discussion of what goes into the first eth2
upgrade.
• Ethstaker video with Danny Ryan : turning off PoW is closer than expected and probably the priority
before sharding
• eth2 issuance : it’s quite low overall and about 95% of the theoretical maximum
• Why is my attestation reward negative if the attestation was immediately included ?
Layer2
• Optimism soft launches with Synthetix, who is rolling out their optimistic rollup transition in five
phases
• You can now transfer to any Eth address on Loopring even if they haven’t yet enabled the zk-rollup
• Connext Vector launches cross-layer2 routing network
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Celer!
Celer is a coherent layer-2 scaling platform on Ethereum powered by Generalized State Channel Network
and Hybrid Rollup technology. Celer has just published a review on the technology and adoption
achievements in 2020 and the roadmap update in 2021. Follow Celer on twitter , blog , discord and
telegram .
Stuff for developers
• Metamask provider breaking changes are live
• ethers-rs v2
• Restless , simple validation library for express.js and Ethereum
• Using Smock to mock contracts in Hardhat
• Tutorial on deploying governance with Hardhat
Security/incidents
• EthGlobal’s DeFi exploits panel video
• Maurelian finds a bzx-style batchTransfer vulnerability in the Sandbox
Ecosystem
• Cloudflare to run the eth.link resolver
Application layer
• Notional finance fixed-rate loaning launches on mainnet
• Yield has fixed-rate, fixed-term loans for Maker using flash loans
• Personal tokens this week from techno DJ Carl Cox , Rick and Morty creator Justin Roiland , indie
rockers Portugal the man , and DJ 3LAU
• Cream’s Ironbank - protocols get whitelisted and then can borrow up to credit limit without
collateral
• 1559 will allow Oiler to create native gas price derivatives
• Stablecoin designs: Fei , a dollarcoin collateralized by ETH on a bonding curve
• Coinbase, Kraken, Binance and Gemini users can buy cover for custody risk on Nexus Mutual
Regulation/business/tokens
• Mnuchin gives up and punts proposed wallet regulations to Biden administration
• OCC allows Anchorage to become a bank
• OCC head Brian Bondy: get ready for selfdriving banks
• Must be a bull market: GoldmanSachs crypto custody is back
• Andre Cronje’s defi sucks rant about community and value
General
• Be careful what apps you download in an app store , fake apps on rise again. Remember: phone numbers
in crypto considered harmful .
• Readable Eth transactions on a hardware wallet with the GridPlus Lattice
• Ledger has another data leak via Shopify
• Censorship resistance and responsibility , viewed from the Livepeer lens
Job Listings
• Trail of Bits is looking for a technical editor/writer & security engineer
• Nexus Mutual: experienced Solidity dev in Euro timezones
• 0x looking for devs of all types and a Matcha marketing manager
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces), payable in ETH (or
250 DAI or 250 USDC) to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions? thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
If you’re wondering “ why didn’t my post make it into Week in Ethereum News ,” then please put it on
an Ethereum subreddit; emails/DMs are not part of my workflow.
Please click the following if you’re interested in sponsoring the newsletter .
Follow @WeekinEthNews and @evan_van_ness on Twitter.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-jan-18-2021/
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
• Jan 22 - Feb 21 - EthIndia’s EtherPunk hackathon
• Feb 5-12 - EthDenver (virtual)
• Mar 5 - Financial Cryptography DeFi academic workshop
• Apr 6-8 - EthCC4 (Paris)
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
